world.bentobox.bentobox.listeners

Class StandardSpawnProtectionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.bentobox.bentobox.listeners.StandardSpawnProtectionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class StandardSpawnProtectionListener
extends Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Handles protection of the standard Nether and/or End spawns.
    Author:
    tastybento

      • atSpawn

        private boolean atSpawn(@NonNull org.bukkit.Location location)
        Check proximity to nether or end spawn location. Used when playing with the standard nether or end.
        Parameters:
        location - - the location
        Returns:
        true if in the spawn area, false if not

      • noAction

        private boolean noAction(@NonNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        If the player is not in the standard nether or standard end or op, do nothing. Used to protect the standard spawn for nether or end.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player
        Returns:
        true if nothing needs to be done
